meanings.definition: Failure to perform a duty or obligation.
meanings.sent1: Her nonperformance in completing the project on time led to consequences.
meanings.sent2: The company suffered due to the nonperformance of its employees.
meanings.sent3: The nonperformance of the student in turning in the assignment was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The nonperformance of the engine left the car stranded on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The nonperformance of the alarm system resulted in a break-in at the store.

meanings.definition: The act of not carrying out a task or responsibility.
meanings.sent1: The team's nonperformance in following the game plan cost them the match.
meanings.sent2: Nonperformance of regular maintenance can lead to equipment breakdowns.
meanings.sent3: The nonperformance of the robot in cleaning the room was comical.
meanings.sent4: The nonperformance of the clock's alarm caused him to oversleep.
meanings.sent5: Her nonperformance in watering the plants caused them to wither.
